languages.text: "Это... сделал Вил'Маражай?" {n}Немигающий взгляд Кибеллы впивается в клеймо, оставленное ксеносом, а лезвие ее кинжала оказывается у вашей шеи. Холод стали немного облегчает ноющую боль.{/n} "Одно твое слово, Домин'{name}, и проклятый ксенос тут же отправится к своим предкам".
languages.translation_comment: Если на игроке стоит клеймо Маражая

traits.locale_text: "Это... сделал Тэй'Маражай?" {n}Немигающий взгляд Кибеллы впивается в клеймо, оставленное ксеносом, а лезвие ее кинжала оказывается у вашей шеи. Холод стали немного облегчает ноющую боль.{/n} "Одно твое слово, Эним'{name}, и проклятый ксенос тут же отправится к своим предкам".

languages.translation_comment: Если на игроке стоит клеймо Маражая

languages.text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."
languages.original_text: "Это... сделал Вил'Маражай?" {n}Немигающий взгляд Кибеллы впивается в клеймо, оставленное ксеносом, а лезвие ее кинжала оказывается у вашей шеи. Холод стали немного облегчает ноющую боль.{/n} "Одно твое слово, Домин'{name}, и проклятый ксенос тут же отправится к своим предкам".

traits.locale_text: "Did... Tei'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the brand that Marazhai has left, and a moment later, her dagger presses against your throat. The cold steel somewhat eases the aching.{/n} "One word from you, Enim'{name}, and the vile xenos will go to meet his vile ancestors."

"Did... Tei'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the brand that Marazhai has left, and a moment later, her dagger presses against your throat. The cold steel somewhat eases the aching.{/n} "One word from you, Enim'{name}, and the vile xenos will go to meet his vile ancestors."

"Did... Tei'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Enim'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

"Did... Tei'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Enim'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

"Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

"Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

languages.text: «Eso... ¿eso se lo ha hecho Vil'Marazhai?». {n}Kibellah observa detenidamente el estigma que te impuso el xenos, y acto seguido presiona el filo de su daga contra tu cuello. El frío tacto del acero alivia un poco tu dolor.{/n} «Dé la orden, Domin'{name}, y el xenos se reunirá con sus antepasados».
languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

traits.locale_text: «Eso... ¿eso se lo ha hecho Vil'Marazhai?». {n}Kibellah observa detenidamente el estigma que te impuso el xenos, y acto seguido presiona el filo de su daga contra tu cuello. El frío tacto del acero alivia un poco tu dolor.{/n} «Dé la orden, Domin'{name}, y el xenos se reunirá con sus antepasados».

languages.text: 「これを…マラズハイがやったの？」{n}キベラは異種族が残した傷跡をじっと見つめ、あなたの喉元へと短剣の刃を押し当てる。鋼鉄の冷たい感触が痛みを少し和らげてくれる。{/n}「一言でいいわ、ドミン・{name}。それであの異種族は、父祖に会いに行くことになる」
languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

traits.locale_text: 「これを…マラズハイがやったの？」{n}キベラは異種族が残した傷跡をじっと見つめ、あなたの喉元へと短剣の刃を押し当てる。鋼鉄の冷たい感触が痛みを少し和らげてくれる。{/n}「一言でいいわ、ドミン・{name}。それであの異種族は、父祖に会いに行くことになる」

languages.text: “这是……敌者玛拉斋干的吗？”{n}绮贝菈盯着玛拉斋留下的印记，迅速将匕首贴在了你的脖颈处，钢铁冰冷的触感稍微减轻了你的痛苦。{/n}“只要你开口，秘者{name}，我就送那个异形去见他的先祖。”
languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

traits.locale_text: “这是……敌者玛拉斋干的吗？”{n}绮贝菈盯着玛拉斋留下的印记，迅速将匕首贴在了你的脖颈处，钢铁冰冷的触感稍微减轻了你的痛苦。{/n}“只要你开口，秘者{name}，我就送那个异形去见他的先祖。”

languages.text: "Hat ... Vil'Marazhai das getan?" {n}Kibellah starrt auf das Mal, das der Xenos hinterlassen hat, und drückt rasch die Klinge ihres Dolches an deine Kehle. Der kalte Stahl lindert den Schmerz ein wenig.{/n} "Ein Wort von Euch, Domin'{name}, und der Xenos geht zu seinen Ahnen."
languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

traits.locale_text: "Hat ... Vil'Marazhai das getan?" {n}Kibellah starrt auf das Mal, das der Xenos hinterlassen hat, und drückt rasch die Klinge ihres Dolches an deine Kehle. Der kalte Stahl lindert den Schmerz ein wenig.{/n} "Ein Wort von Euch, Domin'{name}, und der Xenos geht zu seinen Ahnen."

languages.text: « Est-ce... l'œuvre de Vil'Marazhaii? » {n}Le regard rivé sur la marque laissée par le xénos, Kibellah appose prestement la lame de sa dague sur votre gorge et la froidure de l'acier atténue quelque peu la douleur lancinante.{/n} « Un mot de votre part, Domin'{name}, et le xénos ira rejoindre ses ancêtres. »
languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce... l'œuvre de Vil'Marazhaii? » {n}Le regard rivé sur la marque laissée par le xénos, Kibellah appose prestement la lame de sa dague sur votre gorge et la froidure de l'acier atténue quelque peu la douleur lancinante.{/n} « Un mot de votre part, Domin'{name}, et le xénos ira rejoindre ses ancêtres. »

languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin', and the xenos will meet his ancestors."

languages.text: "Bunu... Vil'Marazhai mı yaptı?" {n}Kibellah, zenonun bıraktığı ize gözlerini dikip hançerini hızlıca gırtlağına bastırıyor. Çeliğin soğuğu, acını biraz olsun dindiriyor.{/n} "O zenoyu atalarına kavuşturmam için tek kelimen yeter Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Did... Vil'Marazhai do this?" {n}Kibellah stares at the mark left by the xenos, and swiftly presses the blade of her dagger to your throat. The cold touch of steel eases the pain a little.{/n} "One word from you, Domin'{name}, and the xenos will meet his ancestors."
